cause.description:
For those who support or are part of College Forward.
www.collegeforward.org
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hZkgoewQhMY
1. We believe that access to higher education is the right of every young Texan.
cause.mission: College Forward provides college access and college persistence services to motivated, economically-disadvantaged students, in order to facilitate their transition to college.
cause.name: College Forward
